👋 Hi, I’ m

Arslan Shahid

I'm a

Hello and welcome to Arslan Shahid's corner of Amazon excellence. As a dedicated Amazon PPC Manager, I specialize in maximizing the return on advertising spend for businesses on the Amazon platform. With a proven track record of effective campaign management and a strong foundation in data analysis, I'm here to drive real results for your brand.

About me

My name is Arslan Shahid

Driving Success Through Expertise and Innovation

With a role as Amazon PPC Manager at The Ambr Group and D1 Brands, I've led end-to-end management of PPC campaigns, optimized budgets, conducted in-depth keyword research, and stayed ahead in the competitive landscape. My skills in campaign performance analysis, marketing, and brand development ensure your Amazon presence is not just managed but thriving

5k
Projects
Completed.
3k
Satisfied
Clients.
Experience
  • 02/2023 - Present
    The Ambr Group

    Led end-to-end management of diverse Amazon PPC campaigns.
    Handled significant monthly ad spend for maximum ROI.
    Utilized tools like Pacvue and Perpetua for advanced analytics.

  • 12/2021 - 02/2023
    D1 Brands

    Setup and managed various Amazon advertising campaigns.
    Conducted extensive keyword research for increased visibility.
    Constantly tested and optimized campaigns for improved performance.

  • 02/2020 - 12/2021
    Freelance Amazon Virtual Assistant

    Proficiently managed and optimized PPC campaigns for enhanced performance.
    Implemented strategic SEO techniques to elevate product rankings and increase visibility.
    Established and maintained a consistent brand presence across client Amazon stores, ensuring a cohesive and impactful online identity.
